remarks: Class builder membership after substituting an expression ` A ` (containing ` y ` ) for ` x ` in the class expression ` ph ` . (Contributed by NM, 10-Jun-2005.)
statement:
rabxfr.1 $e |- F/_ y B $.
rabxfr.2 $e |- F/_ y C $.
rabxfr.3 $e |- ( y e. D -> A e. D ) $.
rabxfr.4 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
rabxfr.5 $e |- ( y = B -> A = C ) $.
rabxfr $p |- ( B e. D -> ( C e. { x e. D | ph } <-> B e. { y e. D | ps } ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d D x y $.
$d ph y $.
$d ps x $.
